name: TankAssault
description:
Take out enemy tanks, cannons and planes and progress through 10 levels of battlefields with different environments and weather adversities.
Choose from range of weapons from shields, machine guns, shields and power blasts and stock up to suite you play.
Upgrade available to improve your tank's firepower and horsepower.
Play with friend for one-on-one duel or complete levels and claim prices to upgrade your tank.
